institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 7 (Business Plan)
contents: Article 7 (Business Plan) ① In accordance with Article 3, Paragraph 2 of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations, the Chairman shall establish an annual business plan for each project, including learning organization, field-customized systematic training, and certification project, including the following items until the project is carried out. Approval must be requested from the Minister of Employment and Labor. 1. Project purpose, 2. Project implementation scale and detailed procedures, 3. Other matters deemed necessary by the Minister of Employment and Labor for project implementation, ② Annual project under paragraph 1. If changes occur in the plan, approval of the change must be requested from the Minister of Employment and Labor at least 7 days prior to application of the change., ③ The Chairman must submit the annual implementation plan approved or approved for change by the Minister of Employment and Labor pursuant to paragraphs 1 and 2. Projects must be carried out accordingly.
